src/lib/components/ChartJs.react.js.description: This component renders ChartJs React component inside Dash App.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: The data object that is passed into the Chart.js chart.

options.description: The options object that is passed into the Chart.js chart.

toolbox.description: Toolbox with reset and download buttons for chart.

clickData.description: clickData returns the datasetIndex and index of data point clicked.

customJSFunctions.description: Write custom JS functions in dict format.

style.description: Defines CSS styles which will override styles previously set.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
